60‚Üí}
    61‚Üí
    62‚Üí# Function to stop services
    63‚Üístop_services() {
    64‚Üí  print_status "Stopping DevFlow v2.1.0 services..."
    65‚Üí
    66‚Üí  # Stop all DevFlow services (including enforcement)
    67‚Üí  local services=(".enforcement.pid" ".ccr.pid" ".synthetic.pid" ".database.pid" ".vector.pid" ".optimizer.pid" ".registry.pid")
    68‚Üí
    69‚Üí  for service_pid in "${services[@]}"; do
    70‚Üí    if is_process_running "$PROJECT_ROOT/$service_pid"; then
    71‚Üí      local pid=$(cat "$PROJECT_ROOT/$service_pid")
    72‚Üí      local service_name=$(echo $service_pid | sed 's/.pid//' | sed 's/\.//')
    73‚Üí
    74‚Üí      if [ "$pid" = "MCP_READY" ]; then
    75‚Üí        print_status "Stopping $service_name (MCP Server)..."
    76‚Üí        rm -f "$PROJECT_ROOT/$service_pid"
    77‚Üí      else
    78‚Üí        print_status "Stopping $service_name (PID: $pid)..."
    79‚Üí        kill -TERM "$pid" 2>/dev/null || true
    80‚Üí        sleep 2
    81‚Üí        if kill -0 "$pid" 2>/dev/null; then
    82‚Üí          print_warning "Force killing $service_name (PID: $pid)..."
    83‚Üí          kill -KILL "$pid" 2>/dev/null || true
    84‚Üí        fi
    85‚Üí        rm -f "$PROJECT_ROOT/$service_pid"
    86‚Üí      fi
    87‚Üí    fi
    88‚Üí  done
    89‚Üí
    90‚Üí  print_status "All DevFlow services stopped."
    91‚Üí}
    92‚Üí
    93‚Üí# Function to start Auto CCR Runner (real system)
    94‚Üístart_ccr() {
    95‚Üí  print_status "Starting Auto CCR Runner..."
    96‚Üí  
    97‚Üí  # Check if Auto CCR Runner is already running
    98‚Üí  if pgrep -f "auto-ccr-runner.js" > /dev/null; then
    99‚Üí    # Ensure PID file exists/updated
   100‚Üí    local pid
   101‚Üí    pid=$(pgrep -f -n "tools/auto-ccr-runner.js" || true)
   102‚Üí    if [ -n "$pid" ]; then
   103‚Üí      echo "$pid" > "$PROJECT_ROOT/.ccr.pid"
   104‚Üí      print_status "Auto CCR Runner already running (PID: $pid)"
   105‚Üí    else
   106‚Üí      print_status "Auto CCR Runner already running"
   107‚Üí    fi
   108‚Üí    return 0
   109‚Üí  fi
   110‚Üí  
   111‚Üí  # Check if auto-ccr-runner exists
   112‚Üí  if [ ! -f "$PROJECT_ROOT/tools/auto-ccr-runner.js" ]; then
   113‚Üí    print_error "auto-ccr-runner.js not found in tools/"
   114‚Üí    return 1
   115‚Üí  fi
   116‚Üí  
   117‚Üí  # Start Auto CCR Runner in background
   118‚Üí  nohup node "$PROJECT_ROOT/tools/auto-ccr-runner.js" > logs/auto-ccr-runner.log 2>&1 &
   119‚Üí  local ccr_pid=$!
   120‚Üí  
   121‚Üí  # Give it a moment to start
   122‚Üí  sleep 2
   123‚Üí  
   124‚Üí  # Check if it's still running
   125‚Üí  if kill -0 $ccr_pid 2>/dev/null; then
   126‚Üí    echo $ccr_pid > "$PROJECT_ROOT/.ccr.pid"
   127‚Üí    print_status "Auto CCR Runner started successfully (PID: $ccr_pid)"
   128‚Üí    return 0
   129‚Üí  else

303‚Üístart_enforcement() {
   304‚Üí  print_status "Starting Claude Code Enforcement Daemon..."
   305‚Üí
   306‚Üí  # Check if daemon binary exists
   307‚Üí  local daemon_path="$PROJECT_ROOT/dist/enforcement-daemon.js"
   308‚Üí  if [ ! -f "$daemon_path" ]; then
   309‚Üí    print_warning "Enforcement daemon not found at $daemon_path - skipping enforcement"
   310‚Üí    return 0
   311‚Üí  fi
   312‚Üí
   313‚Üí  # Check if already running via health check
   314‚Üí  if curl -sf --max-time 2 "http://localhost:8787/health" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
   315‚Üí    # Ensure PID file exists by mirroring daemon PID file
   316‚Üí    local pid_file_actual="$PROJECT_ROOT/devflow-enforcement-daemon.pid"
   317‚Üí    if [ -f "$pid_file_actual" ]; then
   318‚Üí      local actual_pid=$(cat "$pid_file_actual")
   319‚Üí      if kill -0 $actual_pid 2>/dev/null; then
   320‚Üí        echo $actual_pid > "$PROJECT_ROOT/.enforcement.pid"
   321‚Üí        print_status "Claude Code Enforcement Daemon already running (PID: $actual_pid)"
   322‚Üí      else
   323‚Üí        print_status "Claude Code Enforcement Daemon already running"
   324‚Üí      fi
   325‚Üí    else
   326‚Üí      print_status "Claude Code Enforcement Daemon already running"
   327‚Üí    fi
   328‚Üí    return 0
   329‚Üí  fi
   330‚Üí
   331‚Üí  # Create logs directory if it doesn't exist
   332‚Üí  mkdir -p "$PROJECT_ROOT/logs"
   333‚Üí
   334‚Üí  # Start enforcement daemon in daemon mode
   335‚Üí  nohup node "$daemon_path" --daemon > logs/enforcement-daemon.log 2>&1 &
   336‚Üí  local daemon_pid=$!
   337‚Üí

   347‚Üí      print_status "Claude Code Enforcement Daemon started (PID: $actual_pid)"

   349‚Üí      # Perform health check validation
   350‚Üí      local health_check_attempts=0
   351‚Üí      while [ $health_check_attempts -lt 10 ]; do
   352‚Üí        if curl -sf --max-time 2 "http://localhost:8787/health" >/dev/null 2>&1; then

   410‚Üí  fi
   411‚Üí  
   412‚Üí  print_status "All prerequisites met."
   413‚Üí}
   414‚Üí
   415‚Üí# Main execution
   416‚Üímain() {
   417‚Üí  # Handle script arguments
   418‚Üí  case "$1" in
   419‚Üí    stop)
   420‚Üí      stop_services
   421‚Üí      exit 0

   423‚Üí    restart)
   424‚Üí      stop_services
   425‚Üí      # Continue to start services

   427‚Üí    status)
   428‚Üí      print_status "DevFlow v2.1.0 Production Services Status:"
   429‚Üí
   430‚Üí      local services=(
   431‚Üí        ".database.pid:Database Manager"
   432‚Üí        ".registry.pid:Model Registry"
   433‚Üí        ".vector.pid:Vector Memory"
   434‚Üí        ".optimizer.pid:Token Optimizer"

   437‚Üí        ".enforcement.pid:Claude Code Enforcement"
   438‚Üí        ".orchestrator.pid:DevFlow Orchestrator"
   439‚Üí      )
   440‚Üí
   441‚Üí      for service in "${services[@]}"; do
   442‚Üí        IFS=':' read -r pid_file name <<< "$service"
   443‚Üí        if is_process_running "$PROJECT_ROOT/$pid_file"; then
   444‚Üí          local pid=$(cat "$PROJECT_ROOT/$pid_file")
   445‚Üí          if [ "$pid" = "MCP_READY" ]; then
   446‚Üí            print_status "$name: Ready (MCP Server)"
   447‚Üí          else

}

# Function to start DevFlow Orchestrator
start_orchestrator() {
  print_status "Starting DevFlow Orchestrator..."

  # Check if orchestrator is already running
  if curl -sf --max-time 2 "http://localhost:3005/health" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    print_status "DevFlow Orchestrator already running"
    return 0
  fi

  # Check if orchestrator app exists
  if [ ! -f "$PROJECT_ROOT/services/devflow-orchestrator/dist/app.js" ]; then
    print_error "Orchestrator app not found at services/devflow-orchestrator/dist/app.js"
    return 1
  fi

  # Create logs directory if it doesn't exist
  mkdir -p "$PROJECT_ROOT/logs"

  # Start orchestrator in background
  nohup node "$PROJECT_ROOT/services/devflow-orchestrator/dist/app.js" > logs/orchestrator.log 2>&1 &
  local orchestrator_pid=$!

  # Give it a moment to start
  sleep 3

  # Check if it's still running
  if kill -0 $orchestrator_pid 2>/dev/null; then
    # Validate with health check
    local health_attempts=0
    while [ $health_attempts -lt 5 ]; do
      if curl -sf --max-time 2 "http://localhost:3005/health" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo $orchestrator_pid > "$PROJECT_ROOT/.orchestrator.pid"
        print_status "DevFlow Orchestrator started successfully (PID: $orchestrator_pid)"
        return 0
      fi
      sleep 2
      health_attempts=$((health_attempts + 1))
    done

    print_error "Orchestrator started but health check failed"
    return 1
  else
    print_error "Failed to start DevFlow Orchestrator"
    return 1
  fi
}

# Function to check prerequisites

content.text:
**‚úÖ Integrazione Orchestrator Completata**

Ho aggiornato `devflow-start.sh` per includere il DevFlow Orchestrator:

**Modifiche Implementate:**
1. **Stop Services**: Aggiunto `.orchestrator.pid` alla lista dei servizi da fermare
2. **Status Check**: Aggiunto "DevFlow Orchestrator" al controllo stato servizi  
3. **Start Function**: Creata `start_orchestrator()` con health check su porta 3005
4. **Main Startup**: Integrato orchestrator come servizio critico nel processo di avvio
5. **PID Management**: Creato file `.orchestrator.pid` per il processo attualmente in esecuzione

**Orchestrator ora integrato con:**
- Health check automatico (`http://localhost:3005/health`)
- Gestione PID file (`.orchestrator.pid`)
- Logging dedicato (`logs/orchestrator.log`)
- Startup/shutdown automatico via `./devflow-start.sh`
- Controllo stato via `./devflow-start.sh status`

Il sistema √® ora completamente integrato - l'orchestrator verr√† avviato automaticamente insieme agli altri servizi DevFlow e gestito come servizio critico del sistema.

input.request: Create modern TypeScript build pipeline for DevFlow orchestrator service. Need tsconfig.json, package.json scripts, and automated compilation setup. Current situation: we have TypeScript sources in src/ and manually maintained dist/ files. Goal: eliminate manual dist maintenance, enable proper TypeScript development workflow with automatic compilation.
constraints: Must maintain backward compatibility with current dist structure
Should support development and production builds
Integrate with existing DevFlow startup scripts

{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2020",
    "module": "commonjs",
    "lib": ["ES2020"],
    "outDir": "./dist",
    "rootDir": "./src",
    "strict": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "declaration": true,
    "declarationMap": true,
    "sourceMap": true,
    "removeComments": false,
    "noImplicitAny": true,
    "strictNullChecks": true,
    "strictFunctionTypes": true,
    "noImplicitReturns": true,
    "noFallthroughCasesInSwitch": true,
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "baseUrl": "./",
    "paths": {
      "@/*": ["src/*"]
    },
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "experimentalDecorators": true,
    "emitDecoratorMetadata": true,
    "typeRoots": ["node_modules/@types", "src/types"]
  },
  "include": [
    "src/**/*"
  ],
  "exclude": [
    "node_modules",
    "dist",
    "**/*.test.ts",
    "**/*.spec.ts"
  ],
  "ts-node": {
    "esm": true,
    "compilerOptions": {
      "module": "ESNext"
    }
  }
}

{
  "name": "devflow-orchestrator",
  "version": "3.1.0",
  "description": "DevFlow Orchestrator Service - Unified API Gateway for AI Coding Platforms",
  "main": "dist/app.js",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "tsc",
    "build:watch": "tsc -w",
    "start": "node dist/app.js",
    "start:dev": "ts-node src/app.ts",
    "dev": "concurrently \"npm run build:watch\" \"nodemon dist/app.js\"",
    "clean": "rimraf dist",
    "prebuild": "npm run clean",
    "type-check": "tsc --noEmit",
    "lint": "eslint src --ext .ts",
    "test": "jest",
    "test:watch": "jest --watch"
  },
  "keywords": ["devflow", "orchestrator", "ai", "coding", "api-gateway"],
  "author": "DevFlow Team",
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "express": "^4.18.0",
    "socket.io": "^4.7.0",
    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    "helmet": "^7.0.0",
    "morgan": "^1.10.0",
    "dotenv": "^16.3.0",
    "better-sqlite3": "^8.7.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/node": "^20.0.0",
    "@types/express": "^4.17.0",
    "@types/cors": "^2.8.0",
    "@types/morgan": "^1.9.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^6.0.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^6.0.0",
    "typescript": "^5.2.0",
    "ts-node": "^10.9.0",
    "nodemon": "^3.0.0",
    "concurrently": "^8.2.0",
    "rimraf": "^5.0.0",
    "eslint": "^8.45.0",
    "jest": "^29.6.0",
    "@types/jest": "^29.5.0",
    "ts-jest": "^29.1.0"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=18.0.0"
  }
}
